item.title: Netconf feature on Cisco IOS/IOSXE
item.description: I tried to see how ansible works with the netconf feature on Cisco and Juniper in past days: Juniperâ€™s official document is clear and easy to follow. but for Cisco, I followed NETCONF over SSHv2, unfortunately, I was stuck on it for 6 days. OS Version Cisco IOS XE Software, Version 16.04.01 Cisco IOS Software, Linux Software (I86BILINUXL2-IPBASEK9-M), Experimental Version 15.2(20170809:194209) [dstivers-aug9]
